header.paragraph: BlogWorld taps into the brains of the world’s most insightful writers, thinkers, and storytellers to bring you the smartest takes on topics that matter. So whatever your interest, you can always find fresh thinking and unique perspectives.

setCenterBlock.title: In the Future We Will All Live in Star Wars
setCenterBlock.paragraph: The thing you’re doing now, reading prose on a screen, is going out of fashion. The defining narrative of our online moment concerns the decline of text, and the exploding reach and power of audio and video…

setCenterBlock.title: Rubik’s Cube? No, Robotics and AI are…
setCenterBlock.paragraph: In other words, I will try to de-hype the crowd about the recent development in robotics.                          Concretely, OpenAI has claimed some pretty amazing results with learning to solve the Rubik’s cube with a robotic hand…

setCenterBlock.title: How the Internet of Things will Transfo…
